gov.va.med.lom.foundation.service.response.messages

Interface Messages

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMessages, OrderedMessages

    public interface Messages
extends java.io.Serializable
    Container for messages. Any object needing to hold on to Message instances can use a Messages object to manage messages. A Messages instance can provide messages based on their severities, or by the properties with which they are associated. In addition, convenience methods are provided to answer whether the Messages contains certain messages, and/or how many of such messages there are.
